articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Push to bring inclusive football to eastern Victoria for people with disability
articles.description: For people who live in eastern Victoria, like David,  it's not easy to access a footy club with other members who have an intellectual disability, so he's driving a push for a side closer to home.
articles.content:
David Kelly is on a mission to bring an inclusive football team to eastern Victoria.  
Growing up in Lakes Entrance, he developed a love for the game at an early age and played for a number of clubs… [+4414 chars]

articles.content:

articles.title: Footballs and a guitar: The objects left behind at the Uvalde memorial
articles.description: From morning until late at night, people stop and linger at a local memorial, many bearing flowers, balloons candles and other tributes to the lives lost.
